text: Atamjit Singh is a Sahitya Akademi Award winning Punjabi playwright. He returned his Sahitya Akademi Award in October 2015. Singh is a part of the Dakshinayan Abhiyan. ==Books and plays== *Tatti Tavi Da Sach *Panchnad Da Paani (The Waters of the Land of The Five Rivers) ==Awards== Singh won the Sahitya Akademi Award in 2009 for Tatti Tavi Da Sach (Play) and the Sangeet Natak Akademi Award in 2011. == References == Category:21st-century Indian dramatists and playwrights Category:Punjabi-language writers Category:Recipients of the Sahitya Akademi Award in Punjabi Category:Dramatists and playwrights from Punjab, India
title: Atamjit Singh
